data.message: Bahhhhhhha they all mad because he has a mind of his own. They mad because he doesn’t agree with the racist leaders they believe in. They mad because he knows that racism is still prevalent in today’s society and being held as the norm. They mad because he is against social and economic oppression. They mad because they are ignorant simple put.

replies.message: They mad because he is exploiting all this for his own self-aggrandizement.
Melissa Smith and you know this how? Have you ever seen the cypher before this year?
They may be mad, But they know how to write and talk like a person. They all think your a douche.
Jeff Hallock who gives a fuck what you think and how I write. When I fell the need to right correctly I will. So now go back in the corner and play with yourself.

Darryl Greenfield Sounds like your the expert on playing with yourself.And it's feel the need, Not fell the need. While playing with yourself read a book and learn how to spell. And here go fuck yourself.
